title: Inflation rate of Ukraine 1994 to 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate change compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate change compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
Inflation rate change compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1996 to 2001, roughly increasing from 2001 to 2003, and finally roughly constant from 2003 to 2005.

The line drastically decreased by 5.0 times from Year 1996 to 1997,increased by 2.1 times from Year 1998 to 1999,decreased by 15.7 times from Year 2001 to 2002,increased by 6.9 times from Year 2002 to 2003, and lastly, remained stable by 1.7 times from Year 2003 to 2004.
The highest Inflation rate change compared to previous year, of value 80.23 was reached at Year 1996
The lowest Inflation rate change compared to previous year, of value 0.76 was reported at Year 2002
min_summary: In general Inflation rate change compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
Inflation rate change compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1996 to 2001, roughly increasing from 2001 to 2003, and finally roughly constant from 2003 to 2005.

max_summary: In general Inflation rate change compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

The highest Inflation rate change compared to previous year, of value 80.23 was reached at Year 1996

The line rapidly decreased by 80.19% from Year 1996 to 1997,increased by 114.37% from Year 1998 to 1999,decreased by 93.65% from Year 2001 to 2002,increased by 585.53% from Year 2002 to 2003, and lastly, remained stable by 73.51% from Year 2003 to 2004.
